channel.title: Liberty Basic
channel.description: Liberty Basic is a programming language thats like i guess i could call it a newer version of BASIC. Its very easy to learn (Comes with a built in tutorial) and after only a week i was pretty good with it. Download link: [url=http://www.libertybasic.com/download.html]http://www.libertybasic.com/download.html[/url] Anyway... Heres some of liberty Basic somewhat exciting features: [Quote] ' - A real BASIC for Windows! ' - Great price! Free to try, and licenses start at just $29.95 ' - Write modular code with subprograms and functions ' - Simple and easy to use GUI capabilities ' - Call operating systems APIs and use 3rd party DLLs! ' - Create games with sprite animation, sound, and music! ' - Great internet community helps learn & provide support! ' - Support for serial communications! ' - Create standalone programs with purchase of GOLD license! [/Quote]

item.title: Liberty Basic
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I used this to make a lot of things. A pass protected journal, an annoying thing that ran 1000 calcs on ur pc, a merchant helper, and a few other things. This was the second language I learned. Anyone who gets it, you can find it’s serial on serials.ws also, go through the tut. It’s really good.

Read full topic

item.title: Liberty Basic
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

Liberty Basic is a programming language thats like i guess i could call it a newer version of BASIC. Its very easy to learn (Comes with a built in tutorial) and after only a week i was pretty good with it.
Download link: http://www.libertybasic.com/download.html
Anyway…
Heres some of liberty Basic somewhat exciting features:

’ - A real BASIC for Windows!
’ - Great price! Free to try, and licenses start at just $29.95
’ - Write modular code with subprograms and functions
’ - Simple and easy to use GUI capabilities
’ - Call operating systems APIs and use 3rd party DLLs!
’ - Create games with sprite animation, sound, and music!
’ - Great internet community helps learn & provide support!
’ - Support for serial communications!
’ - Create standalone programs with purchase of GOLD license!

Read full topic
